features: 【COMFORTABLE & BREATHER】The cushion of this rolling armless office chair is made of high-density foam cushion, which is not only comfortable, but also has strong rebound. The surface of the seat is covered with mesh fabric, and the breathable mesh design keeps the seat airy, so it won't be stuffy and sweaty even after sitting for a long time;

【FLEXIBLE & SAVE SPACE 】The compact low-back home office desk chair is designed to be more flexible in use, and the 360° rotating swivel task chair is more comfortable to move around; the height-adjustable computer chair is suitable for more small spaces such as bedrooms, study rooms and so on!

【COMFORTABLE & DURABLE OFFICE CHAIR】This mesh armless task chair is made of high quality padded foam cushion, "Y" shaped lumbar support, sturdy base (max weight 250 lbs), upgraded cylinders are SGS certified, and this office chair is BIFMA certified, tested more than 10,000 times in the factory to ensure your.

【HEIGHT ADJUSTABLE & 360° MOVEMENT】This height adjustable computer desk chair can be customized height (16.54"-21.25"), suitable for different heights of desks; This 360° swivel chair comes with smooth casters. This 360° swivel chair is equipped with smooth casters, gliding quietly and smoothly without damaging the floor.

【QUICK AND EASY INSTALLATION】We have prepared an installation video and installation manual for this office chair, as well as the necessary accessories for installation; according to the instructions, you can complete the installation in 5-10 minutes. If you encounter any problems, please feel free to contact us, we are very happy to provide you with satisfactory solutions!

Adjustable Height Swivel Office Chair without Arm for Small Space

What is the height from the floor to the top of the cushion when the desk chair is in its lowest position? This height-adjustable office chair measures 16.54 inches - 21.25 inches from the floor to the top of the cushion and is suitable for many types of desks; What is the weight capacity of this home office chair? This small office chair has a maximum weight capacity of 250 pounds and you can rest assured that the chair is made of high-quality metal. Is assembly easy for this office chair? Absolutely! The installation process for this office chair is straightforward and hassle-free. With just 4 simple steps outlined in the provided installation manual or video, you can have the chair fully assembled in under 10 minutes. What is the seat depth of the home office computer desk chair? The cushion depth of this small size home office chair is 14.76 inches, making it suitable for the average person;

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble, perfect size
reviews.reviewText: I recieved this in the mail today, had it built within 10 minutes! Super easy to assemble and perfect for the cost. It is pretty small, as I am a small person and fit just right. The chair pad does not stay in place which is a little annoying, but it is comfortable to sit in! Again, for the price it is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for college!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for college schoolwork, and it took me maybe five minutes to construct. Two bolts is all that you need to screw in! It all otherwise just pops in and locks together. Comfortable and cost effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Could be nice, but don’t expect much!
reviews.reviewText: This chair is nice-ish and easy to assemble. I guess for the price one can’t complain toooo much. Pros: Looks nice. Easy to put together. Made decent, nothing falls apart. Adjusts easily. Cons: Made for a teen, I weigh about 125 pounds and I am 5’4 and my arse literally feels like it is hanging off the edge. Cushion is flimsy and thin. Doesn’t get very tall, at top height it was just at desk level. Let us just say, if you need a chair to sit in a spot just for a few minutes to look up something on Amazon, okay, but to work in? NO WAY. If you weigh more than 135-140, forget it. Teen? Yes buy. Make up mirror? Yes buy! Just sitting at a desk but never used? Yes buy. Guest chair for skinny guest to watch computer, while you look up Amazon yes buy. Want a kitchen desk chair? Yes buy! College student studying? Maybe, if you are a small man or female.Final words: This is not a chair to work in for more than an hour or your back will kill you, and you will die. Point made? If you are 150 lbs or more, buy two, one for each cheek. Get my drift? Good chair, nothing wrong with it, but ONLY useful for certain situations. 4 star for ease and looks. Really a 3 for overall performance, chair pad, and arse situation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This product is great for small spaces where you need mobility. It is very easy to assemble and comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the cost. Easy assembly
reviews.reviewText: To be honest I purchased those as a throw away until I could afford a high quality chair.This chair surprised me. The chair adjust height easily. The seat pad is comfortable and the rollers don't jam up. Seems a great value for the cost

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not For The Office Only!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this chair to put in my storage shed so that I can work on my motorcycle. The mechanics stool that I have in there is too low to the ground and it offers no back support whatsoever! This chair is just right for working a few hours on the bike, and I have no back pain afterwards. This chair is very comfortable and sturdy, and I don’t feel like I am going to tip over. The thick plastic construction of this chair means that it should last for quite some time. The only thing I would complain about is that the wheels don’t lock, but for the price point, I can live with that! I put this chair together in less than 5 minutes and it even comes with a good Allen Wrench that I threw into my toolbox afterwards. At 6ft-250lbs., there’s no strain on the chair at all! It’s easy to raise and lower and the chair is solidly built. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars VERY small and uncomfortable and feels like it will not last long.
reviews.reviewText: Super disappointed in this chair. I know it was a low price but I just figured that was because there were no frills. This chair is uncomfortable, small, and feels like it won't last long - seems cheaply made. :/ We already put it together so Idk how we can even return it .... taking it all the way apart will not be a pleasant experience. Just buy the $60+ chair instead of trying to save $20.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Being honest doesn’t look like made about of the best materials but maybe because it’s very light, easy to set up, comfortable, I like that I was able to add it to a small space, so far I’m happy
